body.p: This is a way to make each chapter independent (so it can be read separately, as a separate part of your publication). The page counter, figure, and table counters restart at each chapter start - like in the following example:
body.codeblock: 1. First Chapter Table 1.1 Installation Table 1.2 Prerequisites 2. Second Chapter Table 2.1 Tools Table 2.2 Accessories 3. Third Chapter Table 3.1 Cleanup
body.p: The links are also changed. They display the chapter number before the page number to clearly specify the target.
